name: Avoid  classes with too many fields (PHP)
description: This rule searches for all the classes with too many fields.
output:
This report lists all the classes that have too many fields.

This QR provides the following information:
Class  full name.
rationale: Classes that have too many fields could be redesigned to have fewer fields, possibly through some nested object grouping of some of the information. For example, a class with city/state/zip fields could instead have one Address field.
remediation: Modify the source code of the class to reduce the number of fields.
